name: Soko (alyssa_fae)
description:
They Tyranny of Crates has gone on too long! Take your revenge on these cubic pests in this 14-level puzzle extravaganza as you push the evil crates out of your way and into pits on your epic quest to reach the exit of each level.

This is my first completed game ever. It's a short puzzler based on the classic Sokoban. I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it!
